definitions: To cause to be or become; make.
To give or provide (a service, help, etc.).
To translate (something) into another language or form.
To melt down (fat) to clarify it.
examples: The artist is rendering a beautiful landscape.
The company is rendering services to its clients.
The chef is rendering the pork fat for cooking.
The software is rendering the 3D model.
The translator is rendering the text into Spanish.
